item.title: Sources: We were pressured to weaken the mobile security in the 80's
item.description: Authors: FÃ¦raas, Arild Published: January 2014 URL: https://www.aftenposten.no/article/ap-Olkl.html Abstract: Four men who were part of a group that wrote mobile history tell for the first time how strong protection against eavesdropping of cell phones was weakened.
